description: Auto-generate ALT attributes for img tags using Gemini API (supports HTML/PHP/JSX/TSX with static paths)
command.generateVideoAriaLabel: Generate ARIA-LABEL or description for videos
config.geminiApiKey.markdownDescription:
Gemini API Key ([Get API key from Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/api-keys))  

**Note:** The API key is stored securely and displayed as dots for security.  
[Clear API Key](command:alt-generator.clearApiKey)
config.generationMode.description: [Image] Set what to prioritize when generating ALT text
config.generationMode.markdownDescriptio: [Image] Set what to prioritize when generating ALT text.
config.generationMode.enum.seo: SEO: Generate ALT text focused on search engine optimization (SEO)
config.generationMode.enum.a11y: A11Y: Generate ALT text focused on accessibility (A11Y) improvement
config.insertionMode.description: Set how to insert generated text
config.insertionMode.markdownDescription: Set how to insert generated text.
config.insertionMode.enum.confirm: Manual: Review generated text content before manual insertion
config.outputLanguage.description: Set the language of generated text
config.decorativeKeywords.markdownDescri: If the filename contains these keywords, it will be identified as decorative and the ALT will be set to empty (`alt=""`).
config.contextAnalysisEnabled.descriptio: Analyze surrounding text to prevent redundancy
config.contextAnalysisEnabled.markdownDe: Analyze surrounding text of images and videos. If already described by surrounding text, automatically sets `alt=""` to prevent duplicate descriptions for screen readers.
config.videoDescriptionLength.descriptio: [Video] Set the detail level of generated text. Use transcript mode for creating text manuscripts for audio descriptions, etc
config.videoDescriptionLength.markdownDe: [Video] Set the detail level of generated text. Use transcript mode for creating text manuscripts for audio descriptions, etc.
config.videoDescriptionLength.enum.summa: Summary: A concise label to identify what the video is before playing it
config.videoDescriptionLength.enum.trans: Transcript: A complete transcription including visual information to fully understand the video content
config.customPromptsPath.markdownDescrip:
Path to a Markdown file containing custom prompts for ALT text and video description generation. Specify as a relative path from the workspace root.  

**Example:** `.vscode/custom-prompts.md`  

**Important:** This file allows you to customize prompts using Markdown format with H1 sections. You can also specify the Gemini API model. If the file is not found, the extension's default prompts will be used. See documentation for the file format.
